A vvhip for an ape: or Martin displaied Lyly, John, 1554?-1606, attributed name.
7, [1] p.
Printed by T. Orwin?, [London? : 1589?]
Sometimes attributed to John Lyly. A tract in the Martin Marprelate controversy. In verse. Imprint from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
